name: Papa's Cheeseria Order Chaos
description:
******Disclaimer**************************************************************************

When I uploaded the game some of the text got set off place so please do not mind the offset text all buttons should still work as usual. Just click on buttons and not text. 

********************************************************************************************

The point of the game is to get as many orders as possible. 

How to play:

-use cash register by clicking the different tabs that represent different ingredients bread, cheese, meat, sauce. 

-In each tab select the ingredient that the customer is asking for.

-click the enter button once you have your order completed

I love the Papa's Franchise so I made a variation of the cheeseria game by using the ingredients found in the game. This is the first time making a 3D Game so things are very janky. Also I did not have much time to mess with graphics, so dont mind those for now. 

Follow On Twitter:  @DevDanyel

Updates to possibly come:

-plan to add sound

-plan to spruce up the gameplay

-plan to also spruce up the graphics. 

-plan to fix offset text

Citations:

Animated Characters 1 (1.0)
